title: The Jolly Jumbuck
brief_description: A short story involving performances by a travelling puppeteer show, The Jolly Jumbuck, which is operated by the Moonee Valley Regional Library and the Library Council of Victoria. Shows their visit to a small school in Melbourne, the Pascoe Vale South Primary School, where the puppet performance is put on for grades 5 and 6. Includes footage of the colourful puppet antics and the children’s reactions. Storytellers: Neil Bell, Oliver Roznay, Rino Tomisich. Music performed by Grades 5 and 6, Pascoe Vale South Primary School.
